product.name: allen + roth 3-Light Merington Brushed Nickel Standard Bathroom Vanity Light
product.description: Specifications Collection Name: Merington Type: Vanity light bar Number of Lights: 3 Style: Transitional Theme: N/A Shape: N/A Length (Inches): 21.5 Height (Inches): 9 Depth (Inches): 5.5 Weight (lbs.): 7 Shade Included: Yes Lighting Direction: Up/downlighting Fitter Type: N/A Fixture Material: Metal Shade Material: Glass Glass Type: N/A Frosted Glass: Yes Bulbs Included: No Number of Bulbs Required: 3 Number of Bulbs Included: 0 Maximum Bulb Wattage (or Equivalent): 60 Bulb Type: Standard Light Bulb Base Type: Medium base (E-26) Recommended Light Bulb Shape: A19 Dimmable: No Mounting Hardware Included: Yes For Use in Kitchens: No For Use in Dining Rooms: No For Use in Bathrooms: Yes For Use in Foyers: No For Use in Bedrooms: No For Use in Living Rooms: No UL Safety Listing: No CSA Safety Listing: No ETL Safety Listing: Yes ADA Approved: No Usage Rating: Damp rated ENERGY STAR Certified: No Shade Color: Frosted Opal Fixture Color Family: Nickel Fixture Finish: Brushed Manufacturer Color/Finish: Brushed Nickel Power Source: Hardwired
product.bullet_points:
• This Merington collection vanity light is the perfect addition to your bathroom remodel. Features 3 hand painted glass shades to add beauty and warmth.
• Brushed nickel finish bathroom vanity light from the Merington collection offers a clean, timeless look
• Frosted opal glass shades create a soft, warm glow; Great for transitional style decor
• Three 60-watt A19 bulbs required (sold separately); Mounting hardware included for an easy installation
• Can be installed facing up or down to suit your preference; Damp rated for use in bathrooms
